name: Sunscreen Doesn't Work In Hell
description:
Very early demo.

A bullet-hell magic-themed FPS with fast gameplay and randomly generated maps.

Hold Q to switch spells. Clear room to get access to the next one.

Press E to disable and enable the Pixel shader.

There is no boss yet. If you reach the red room, you win :D

It needs a beefy PC, sorry. I  haven't optimized it yet.
